p: Considering the clinical presentation and the ECG, laboratory, and echocardiography findings, the patient was diagnosed with acute pericarditis caused by SARS-CoV-2 with suspected mild viral pneumonia. The treatment included lopinavir/ritonavir (200/50 mg twice daily), aspirin (100 mg once daily), a beta-blocker (bisoprolol 2.5 mg once daily), and an antibiotic (ceftriaxone 2 g once daily).
